about_the_game: Space Battle weapons is the first content pack for Adventures of Dragon, bringing new weapons and a new sexy move.

content_descriptors.notes: Horsehung mask has a big bulge in her panties but there's no full frontal nudity.

detailed_description:
Feature List

  • New Location, Space Station Beta avaivable via Warp Drive
  • 4 new weapons
  • New NPC "Horsehung Mask" that rewards you with a new Sexy move "Cock Block" if you have had sex with enough women
  • New Achievement "Horse Trained"


About the Game

Space Battle weapons is the first content pack for Adventures of Dragon, bringing new weapons and a new sexy move.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 or better Display
